name: TokenHotbar
title: Token Hotbar
description:
With Token Hotbar you can assign one of the hotbar pages to remember macros per token and/or actor. If the token is a linked token, the hotbar will be linked to the actor by default.


Updates

🎲 Added user setting to show debug message in console.
🐛 Token Hotbars sometimes disappear due to race conditions.
🐛 Switching tokens with hotbars flickers last active bar.
🐛 Selecting multiple tokens shows token hotbar of one of the tokens.
⚡ Slight performance improvements.
author: Stan Janssen
